nodes.text: The Controller FP was a force pike manufactured by SoroSuub Corporation.

Built by SoroSuub Corporation, the Controller FP was a two-meter long force pike made of graphite which bent under pressure rather than breaking. It was topped with a power tip, and had two power settings; "stun" and "lethal." The entire weapon weighed less than seven kilograms.
The Controller FP was utilized by the Emperor's Royal Guard.
